entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump “ I” “ me” “ my” “ mine” . Meanwhile, how many innocent American’s soldiers blood is on your hands, unemployment numbers, COVID-19 cases? You owe those parents a face to face apology. That would be the right thing to do. I know you think you’re above that though
